title: (Jr/Sr) QA Engineer, KMS Labs - BONUS
location_detail: 290/26 Nam Ky Khoi Nghia, ward 8, District 3, Ho Chi Minh
reason_job:
Inspired Leadership Team and Talented Colleagues 
Onsite opportunities: North America, Europe, Asia
Attractive salary and benefits
job_description:
KMS Labs is the startup incubation arm of KMS Technology. Our team consists of technology entrepreneurs and builders who have lived through everyday struggles of launching and operating software businesses for the last 2 decades. Examples of companies we have built from the ground up:

QASymphony: Leading agile test management platform. Merged with Tricentis, a Europe tech unicorn.
Kobiton: Mobile testing platform with big clients such as Uber, AT&T, Office Depot, Frontier Airlines and Capgemini. Raised $19.2M from top-tier VCs and acquired Mobile Labs.
Katalon: All-in-one test automation solution being used by more than 65,000 companies from over 160 countries all over the world. Gartner Peer Insights Customers’ Choice in March 2020.
GroveHR: HR platform that helps SMBs digitize their HR operations and create attractive digital employee experience, being used by more than 3000 companies in many countries.
Below are some key responsibilities we expect of you:

Own the testing strategy and define test plans for each software release.
Lead other QAs to develop, maintain and execute testing for our product features during development cycles and releases.
Report, track, and monitor defects on the defect tracking system.
Investigate defect reports from production support and isolate their causes.
Work with the product team to understand product requirements and designs and provide feedback during product development cycles.
Collaborate with Automation tester to define automation scope, handle automation execution, automation result, and the coverage report
skill_experience:
Strong computer science foundation and knowledge of SDLC.
Likely having 3+ years of experience in web-based software testing.
Excellent interpersonal and independent working skills.
Strong critical thinking and problem-solving skills.
love_working:
Perks you Enjoy:

Highly competitive salary and benefits
Work with a highly talented team in one of the best places to work in Vietnam
Modern office in HCMC; premium healthcare insurance for you and your family; annual company trip and year-end party; many fitness/sport programs and team building events; in-house entertainment facilities, snacks and beverages.
And much more, join us to build high-impact global products from Vietnam!

title: QA Engineer (Senior/Lead)
location_detail: Etown Central, 11 Doan Van Bo street, District 4, Ho Chi Minh
reason_job:
Attractive Salary & Bonuses
Global Product Environment
Rewarding Career Path
job_description:
We are looking for a QA Engineer (Senior/Lead level) to join an Agile development team and take part in every development lifecycle to ensure product quality and release plan. This role plays an important part in our company’s product development process. Our ideal candidate will be responsible for conducting tests before product launches to ensure software runs smoothly and meets user's needs while being cost-effective.

Your key responsibilities are:

Participate in sprint planning and work closely with the Scrum team to analyze requirements and provide necessary QA/test recommendations
Review requirements, specifications, and technical design documents to provide timely and meaningful feedback
Create detailed, comprehensive, and well-structured test plans and test cases
Estimate, prioritize, plan and coordinate testing activities
Execute all testing activities (manual & automated testing) to improve product quality, work closely with the team (engineers, product manager, customer service, operation, etc.) to deliver the product success
Identify, record, document thoroughly, and track bugs
Monitor debugging process results
Investigate the causes of non-conforming software and train users to implement solutions
Track quality assurance metrics, like defect densities and open defect counts
Support, review, and provide necessary training to other QA/QC Engineers
Stay up-to-date with new testing tools and test strategies
*** During these last months of 2021, we're offering a special signing bonus of up to 2 month-salary - as an attempt to show how much we appreciate having you accompany us, on the journey to fantastic growth in the years ahead!
skill_experience:
Key Qualifications

5+ years of experience in QA/QC role with at least 1 year of experience in leading a small QA/QC team
Have good knowledge of the testing process (test strategy, test approach, test plan, test case, bug report, testing report,...)
Hands-on experience in designing, implementing and executing test automation with Katalon, Selenium, Appium,... or any of automation tools
Familiar with Agile/Scrum environment
Knowledge of CI/CD process (Jenkins, Github, Azure Pipelines,...)
Strong leadership skills; Experience in coaching/training QC/QA members
Strong ability to work around cross-functional teams (Product, Engineering, Operations, Customer Support,...) to improve team productivity
Good knowledge of product quality metrics
Dedication to quality and a positive, collaborative attitude and approach to testing
Good communication skills (both in Vietnamese & English)
Bonus Points

Bachelor degree in Computer Science/ Software Engineering
Experience in web & API testing is preferred
Experience in building automation frameworks is a big plus

job_description:
1. Overall Job Purpose:

We are SCC – Specialist Computer Centres – Europe’s leading provider of IT services and solutions. An opportunity has presented itself for an experienced Microsoft Business Applications Developer to join an exciting and challenging transformation programme.

This role is a great opportunity for a Business Applications Developer. SCC is at the start of a major transformation programme expected to span four years which will involve the replacement of several applications with D365 F&O. Power Platform will be used heavily for custom Line of Business applications to help facilitate the migration to the cloud. SCC is a dynamic company and it is expected that the D365 and Power Platform solution will continue to develop post the initial implementation programme.

We are looking for a Business Applications Developer who will play a pivotal role in building in-house Line of Business applications utilising the Power Platform. The ideal candidate must have extensive experience with Microsoft azure services and low code platform like Power Platform, some experience of D365 F&O would also be an advantage.

Successful candidate will work within the SCC IT Development team to design, develop and maintain for IT projects within the SCC Group. They will also perform any other duties which may be allocated to them due to developing technologies and business requirements.

2. Main Duties of Job:

Refactoring and developing legacy apps into cloud platform with Power Platform.
Work closely within the architecture team, following agile methodology for software development process, using Azure DevOps tool to apply DevOps process.
Ensure adherence to coding standards and best practices
Liaising with the business and project team to understand and refine requirements
Attend daily stand-ups, retrospectives and sprint planning sessions
Estimate work being considered for future sprints.
Taking responsibility for projects/tasks and reporting of progress to line management.

In this role you are responsible for one of the most important product areas of our Autoscout24 - buying journey and search funnel. The focus area is very up-front of our platform: homepage, filter-search system, search result listing page.
Your customers will be the most important clients of our company: consumer - car buyers.
You understand like no others the needs of our consumers and their buying journey, and be there for our consumers from the first moment they realize they will need a new car, guide and support them in the best and easiest way.

Drive the scrum/sprint toward together with Engineer team.
Your work will be a combination of product innovation (new ideas to attract users to the platform) as well as executing some strategic initiative (e.g., Rebranding Autoscout24).

We are a dynamic, fast-growing team that’s excited about e-commerce and logistics and the opportunity to transform these industries with data and technology. Join us and our journey to drive growth in the e-commerce market. We are looking for you as a Data Engineer

WE NEED YOU ON OUR TEAM!

You will be part of a young & motivated team, driving the next level of growth of our Parcel Perform and Parcel Monitor applications that help customers track e-commerce shipments around the globe. As part of our team, you will have a very direct impact on the success of the company.

As a data engineer, you are in charge of the data ecosystem, which includes everything from data sources and databases to data storage solutions. These components are connected by pipelines that transport and transform data. Your work would orbit around the formation of a data lake, and system and tools to consume this data lake.

You will be working side by side with our engineers and data scientists in both data analysis processes and bringing prediction models to the production environment.

And you will also be developing analytical tools and programs. Though we are promoting the use of open sources, some situations call for bespoke software for better customization, user experience, and data accuracy
skill_experience:
WHAT YOU SHOULD BRING ALONG!

We at Parcel Perform believe in innovation, energy, and resourcefulness for everything we do. We will not stop delivering an outstanding product that we can be proud of and need you to help us to inform the world. You need to feel the same way about our offering and bring along the following things:

The skills

At least 4 years of working as a data engineer
Solid foundation in Python and at least another language in the JVM family
Deep knowledge of SQL Database design
Experience with distributed system, high volume Databases, and ETL pipelines
Familiarity with Big data analysis
Exposure to a wide range of NoSQL solutions
Excellent critical thinking, organizational and communication skills
Strong ownership and good collaboration skills to work in a team
Good English communication
love_working:
WHAT YOU WILL RECEIVE IN RETURN!

The competitive compensation package, and a preference for internal promotions.
Unlimited leave plan
Flexible working hours, and open environment. Work From Home is available by requests
Premium insurance and annual medical checkup
Free lunch, free fruit, snacks are provided.
Weekly 1-1 catch-up for training and career development, team bonding events, various training programs.
Unlimited to O’Reilly technical materials.
Opportunities to work alongside people from around the world that share the same passion and dedication.
Locating in a quiet area with little traffic, full of natural light and within walking distance to many convenient facilities, our office in Ho Chi Minh City makes work-life integration to the fullest.

love_working:

title: Quality Assurance (QA QC, Tester)
location_detail: Quận 1, District 1, Ho Chi Minh
reason_job:
Thu nhập 1000$ ~ 2000$
Sản phẩm 1 triệu paid users
Tự quyết giải pháp công nghệ
job_description:
At Topica, our mission is to make education accessible to everyone and enable lifelong learning. We’re a multidisciplinary team that’s passionate about creating products that improve people’s lives. We believe our growth would come by building a core team that will focus exclusively on how to make world-class products. 

We are currently recruiting for a QA to join our expanding Tech Team here in Topica.

The QA will be expected to track, monitor and take the full responsibility of the quality of the software products which we deliver to our users.

The QA will play a pivotal role in our organization, and will be working closely with colleagues which are based all over the world in our Design Teams, Product Teams, Development Teams guiding and leading the way in terms of requirements and solutions

Last but not least, the QA will work closely with our users, investigating on if and how we can improve our product and user experience.

 What will you do?

Be responsible for our product quality
Work closely with Design, Product & Developers
Support our users in getting a supreme user experience.
Other Ad-Hoc assignments as required.
skill_experience:
Previous experience in developing Web application and Mobile Application.
Experience with bug management tool and development life cycle
Experience in API testing
Possess good mathematical / logical thinking skills
Develop checklist, manual test cases and prioritize scope testing activities.
Execute all the manual test cases, performance tests, and report defects, define severity and priority for each defect.
Experience in creating a great UX and can optimize our user’s experience.
A helpful, and kind personality – Interest in working in a team.
English skill, on at least an intermediate level.
Collaborator, able to contribute to a variety of tasks.
Creative and independent problem solver and time management
Nice to have:

Automation Test skill is an advantage, but not a must 
Experience in JMeter
love_working:

Lunch and parking allowance
Fast paced and multinational working environment
Supportive and professional colleagues
Awesome & open co-working space
Internal Training (Technical & Functional); Opportunities for English Training
You will be joining Topica at the beginning of an exciting journey, and will be given a large degree of freedom in shaping and impacting your role. Furthermore, we offer an attractive remuneration package, matching our requirements and expectations.

Đề cao sự tư duy sáng tạo và tự do đóng góp ý tưởng cho sản phẩm
Được đào tạo nghiệp vụ đều đặn và lộ trình thăng tiến rõ ràng.

title: Senior Javascript Engineer
location_detail: Mapletree Business Centre, District 7, Ho Chi Minh
reason_job:
State-of-the-art technologies
Collaboration with top coders
Megascale user-facing problems
job_description:
Get to know the team

The Business Process Automation team is a longstanding team responsible for coding automation solutions for all countries and verticals across Grab Operations. We make an impact by reducing manual work, increasing connectivity between systems and making bespoke scripts to drive value across the Org. Our team is made up of a diverse team of data analysts, full stack engineers, problem solvers and innovators. If you are looking for exciting challenges, organizational wide impact and to be part of a high-performing team then we’re the right place for you!

Get to know the role
We are looking for a new Senior Engineer for our Integration team. We believe a successful candidate has advanced problem solving, Node.js and Fullstack programming skills, but if you believe you have what it takes then we’d love to hear from you either way. This role is required as we expand the team and continue to take on new opportunities. You will get to innovate, automate and help solve pressing problems across the organization.  This role embraces your hard and soft skills to create automation tools for manual processes. Your work will have a huge impact on business operations by improving the performance and SLA of processes. 

The Day-to-Day Activities
 
You need to work closely with business users to learn the business process, after which you will design a solution to automate that process after standardizing and optimizing it from end to end. This will require following:

Developing and assisting to develop automation solutions using Node.js, including but not limited to, scripts, microsites, websites.

Escalating new needs to related product and design teams for possible integration of tools into main Grab back office tool suites.

Meeting with business users to gather and document requirements.

Propose design optimizations to ensure better solution design.

Optimizing and maintaining automation scripts.

Developing npm packages for internal use.

Assist other team members to optimize and bugfix.

Help junior team members debug and problem solve on their projects

Other related duties as required by Team Lead.
skill_experience:
The Must-Haves

Strong understanding of software design, Agile, programming best practices.

High proficiency working with Javascript (Node.js experience a big plus)

Proficiency with Git a plus

Communication, interpersonal and stakeholder management skills.

English will be required to communicate effectively with stakeholders.


Work Experience Requirements

4+ years experience in software development, preferably in Javascript/frontend development 


Key Attributes / Skill Sets

Knowledge of and experience working in front-end programming languages (Javascript, HTML, CSS).

Knowledge of Git, SSH and other programming tools.

Excellent communication and organizational skills 

Detail oriented and thorough.

Keen and prudent judgment and decision making.

Ability to implement and execute change accordingly.

Ability to analyze data to assess trends and issues impacting performance.

Knowledgeable with office computing tools Microsoft Office / Google Docs.

Knowledge of Node.js, Google APIs, Vue.js, jQuery, Bootstrap a plus.

Knowledge of MySQL and server-side programming is a plus.

Strong English skills a big plus.
Education Requirements
University Graduate, in Computer Science or if not, multiple years of work experience programming in javascript.
love_working:
We care a great deal about code quality. We often go back and improve core parts of the codebase to make it better or more lean. We can do this because of great test coverage which will immediately sound the alarm when something goes wrong.

We ship on quality instead of on time. When a feature is ready we deploy it immediately to everyone or use an internal system to roll it out to a certain percentage of customers. Various teams deploy new code many times throughout the day.

What will you have at Grab (Vietnam):

1. Positive & Collaborative environment

Grabbers thrive in a corporate culture that values every team member's contribution towards our goal of improving lives.

2. Rocket fuel for careers

Grabbers experience hyper professional growth and all the challenges that entails. Grow your skills while working to solve real issues across the region.

3. Fun & dedicated family

Grabbers work hard and play hard. Our teams grow as one as they overcome challenges and have fun along the way.

4. Some of benefits are:

MacBook is provided.
Extra Medical Insurance.
14 days annual leaves, working Monday - Friday.
Free drive with Grab (budget follow your level)
Rewards on Grab for Grab Transport, Grab Mart, Grab Food
Internal Mobility to regional: Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, China,...
Grab is Southeast Asia’s leading everyday everything app – providing transportation, logistics and financial services to millions of users across the region. Powered by heart and driven by technology, we aim to unlock the true potential of the region by solving the problems that hinder progress for our communities. If you share our vision of Driving Southeast Asia Forward, apply to join our team today.

The successful applicant will be accountable for the leadership of one or more engineering scrum teams to plan, deliver and support service features that deliver customer value and/or mature service capability.

The position is also accountable for executing the people leader fundamentals in line with NAB Policies, driving a learning-based culture with an ability to set and gain agreement for realistic and stretching objectives for the team.

YOUR JOB RESPONSIBILITIES 

Manage multi Agile teams to deliver on engineering standards, sprint backlogs, and plans, engineers’ responsibilities and performance management, code quality, adherence to development, and testing guardrails.
Manage milestones, deliverables, risks, and dependencies of the engineering teams.

job_description:
About the role

More than the act of testing, the act of designing tests is one of the best bug preventers known. In Epsilo, we respect the thinking that must be done to create a useful test that can discover and eliminate bugs before they are coded. We're looking for a tester with test-design thinking who can discover and eliminate bugs at every stage in the creation of software, from conception to specification, to design, coding, and the rest.

Responsibilities

Review requirements, specifications, and technical design documents to provide timely and meaningful feedback.
Create detailed, comprehensive, and well-structured test plans, test cases, and test reports.
Estimate, prioritize, plan and coordinate testing activities.
Identify, record, document thoroughly, and track bugs.
Perform thorough regression testing when bugs are resolved.
Develop and apply testing processes for new and existing products.

Excellent analytical skills.
Good written and verbal communication skills.
Strong attention to detail.
Experience working in an Agile/Scrum development process.

job_description:
VinBrain is a company funded by VinGroup, the largest conglomerate in Vietnam by market capitalization. Our mission is to perform cutting-edge research and development of AI, Machine Learning, and Deep Learning technologies and products that will lead to improve healthcare system and quality of life. At VinBrain, we believe the greatest promise of Big Data lies in healthcare. We believe that by solving unique and challenging problems at the intersection of (medical) Big Data, AI, IoT, and IoP (Internet of People), we can improve the outcomes for patients around the globe. We have assembled seasoned researchers, engineers, and entrepreneurs from world-class companies such as Microsoft, Amazon, Adobe and Google to build the platform and services to achieve this. If you are motivated to be part of something special and to be a catalyst for improving lives and healthier communities, we want to talk to you.

Who we are looking for: experienced backend engineers who will play a central role in building out both the large-scale intelligent products that runs in the cloud to improve patients and doctor experiences. As a member of our dynamic, agile team, you will have influence on defining product features, design and implement products features and drive operational excellence, and spearhead the engineering best practices that enable a high-quality product.

Design and implement core and software components for our system
Analyze and improve efficiency, scalability, and stability of various system resources
Optimize machine learning algorithms for runtime and integrate them into products
Understand clinician workflows, work closer with experts (doctors, specialists) and how our product can best fit into those workflows
Familiar and growing your own expertise in machine learning
Collaborate effectively with product managers and applied scientists to build successful products
Build software framework that optimize and reuse in development life cycle
Practice disciplined software engineering (e.g. automated testing, code reviews)
skill_experience:
Bachelor's Degree in computer science or related field, or equivalent practical experience
Possess strong skills in object-oriented software design and programming
Experience in at least 3+ years one of the programming languages: Java, JavaScript/TypeScript, NodeJS, React, Python
Experience in REST API design and implementation
Experience with a variety of SQL and NoSQL databases
Experience working with systems dealing with large scale data storage, processing (real-time and batch), and analytics
Working knowledge with one or more of open source technologies: Hadoop, Yarn, Spark, Kafka, Storm, Hive, Docker, Kubernetes and source control tools such as Git
Experience in a DevOps environment to deploy your own code is a plus

• Work with iconic IT projects and programs

• Work with the brightest minds in the industry

job_description:
fram^ has committed to help our Europe, US, Asia Pacific and especially Scandinavian companies leverage the talent and power of Vietnamese rockstar developers and another online industry talent. fram^ is a very different company. First of all, our culture is different – we believe that to write world-class code you need to work in an environment that energizes you and with colleagues that inspire and challenge you. Hence, we sit in a specially designed, Scandinavian office on Nguyen Cong Tru in central Ho Chi Minh City. We also hire Vietnam’s top 2% developers and internet industry talent. Come and visit us to find out if you have what it takes to become a key player in our team, serving Scandinavian and global clients from our base in Ho Chi Minh City!

WHAT YOU WILL DO?

You will mainly work with Flutter to architect, build and scale the application.
You will be working in a fast-paced agile environment where you will have a lot of autonomy and the ability to shape the future direction of the app.
You will also work, to a lesser extent, with the server-side API for the app.

job_description:
Game Product Owner (20%)
- Frequent practitioner of the principle of Agile Mindset, Design Thinking, Data-Driven Decision Making
- Set the long term strategy and goals of the product, with the aim of maximizing the top line while optimizing the ROI
- Report on the product’s performance to top management and define the next steps
- Decide and maintain the product roadmap with the Product Manager
- Influence and inspire a cross-disciplinary team to deliver features to the highest quality standards, in alignment with performance goals
- Promoting positive & transparent communication and a culture of People & Result Orientation
- Ability to take a holistic view of product development, across the creative, marketing / UA, technical and data branches

Game Design (30%)
- Model, tune and manage complex game systems & mechanics (rewards, features) to engage players & fulfill their needs;
- Design, prototype and support the economic systems to drive players to engage with the game’s economy.
- Leading the collaborative process with other designers, artists, engineers to transform game concepts into high-quality products with strong player engagement, retention, and monetization.
- Continuously review development progress to ensure the final product quality meets the high expectations.
- Leading the A/B Test effort to find out more insight, and share with others.

- Monitor game performance and analyze user data to improve existing features or deliver new ones to existing games, ultimately boost game KPIs.

- Define and fine-tune all systems related to player motivation, rewards, social and progression.

Economy Design (50%)
- Use strong knowledge in macro and behavioral economics (game theory, sociology, etc.) to create the in-game economy and its money life cycle (production, sinks, inflation);
- Define the virtual products (relation, life cycle, streams of availability);
- Collaborate with the data analyst to design the metrics system to ensure the data collection triggering economy adjustments and tuning;
- Support and work closely with the monetization manager to provide monetization opportunities.
- Design, managing all economic aspects of the game design, balance game system in-game economy, difficulty progression to engage players on the long term and provide monetization opportunities

- Graduated from a university that requires Math, Statistical probability, Logic skill
- Prototyping or ideation know-how
- Define the virtual products (relation, life cycle, streams of availability)

* Background in technical or programming

- Knowledge about Games statistics & tracking
- Have a wide range of experience in different game genres

- Good understanding of players' psychology.

- Passion for playing and making games
- Sense of responsibility and teamwork spirit
- Blending between Player Focus + Innovation + Decision Making
- Superb communication skills, both verbal and written
- Plus
* Experience shipped one or more puzzle/arcade/casual games
* Ability to create a prototype by yourself with any creation software or game engine (Unity3d, cocos, Game Maker,...)
* A dedicated balance between left/right brain

love_working:
We hope VNG is a place where you build your career. Whether you want to pursue to be a manager or focus on professional development, we acknowledge and appreciate your talents. Therefore, we open up to you more promotion opportunities in VNG, and designed program to help you succeed in every single career path. 

NO SUIT, NO TIE: At VNG, we do not have many rules because we respect you and want to make comfortable atmosphere to help employees perform their jobs well.

Company “pay” for you: Lunch, parking, swimming, learning English or gym for free and you know you are really in care.

NO BARRIERS: Office of VNG is an open space because we always try to remove all barriers to help members easily shares with each other.

Being a big family: Like a gift for family day. A party for the kids. We know how much your family matters.

NO RANK At VNG, members are encouraged to contribute ideas and debate with the others.

Be explored: Ph.D., un-academic guy, bookish girl, fashion designers ... VNGers are different and this diversity makes life more colorful.

NO "OFFICE": Office is like your home. You can hang paintings, plant trees, even feed aquarium on the desk.

Be showed your best: VNGers like to "mortification" with the group games such as: Fansipan climbing, waterfall rafting, go over heat mats; there activities not only are tightening friendship, but also practice their bravery.

GAMING: Even if you do not make the game, stealing beans in the boss’s garden or versusing with your colleagues in a sword competition play online is also an interesting way to relax.

Changing the world: Creating an entertainment channel, building a social network and developing a game. On the Internet world, every single thing you did can change the lives of many people.

is the mobile experience platform trusted by leading organizations globally. We are a startup with BIG dreams - revolutionize the way businesses collaborate to build next-generation customer engagement platforms, creating exceptional values for users and businesses together.

Our coalition loyalty platform enables consumers to earn rewards conveniently and joyfully by interacting with the brands of their choices across a nationwide merchant network that today reaches 30% of the Vietnamese consumers. We aim to redefine the omnichannel shopping experience and set the standards on how brands should engage their customers by leveraging data to drive consumer insights, marketing efficiency, and product personalization.

TAPTAP is a trademark of VUI Vietnam, which is a Joint Venture company that is owned by Vietnam Investments Group (VIG) and United Overseas Bank Limited (UOB). VIG is a leading private equity firm in Vietnam with total funds under management of over USD 500 million and with stakes in over 35 brands in the market. UOB is a leading bank in Asia, headquartered in Singapore, with a global network of over 500 offices including Vietnam.

WHAT YOU WILL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR:

title: UI-UX Designer (Agile)
location_detail: Fl.4th, Block A, Viettel Building, 285 Cach MangThang 8 St., W.12, Dist. 10, HCMC, Vietnam, District 10, Ho Chi Minh
reason_job:

job_description:
SUMMARY:

User Experience and User Interface are both the window into our POPS universe. And the key to our business success is happy users.
You will be responsible for designing intuitive UI, creating interaction flows, and helping guide the direction of the products to reach its ultimate goal closely working with the product managers, business stakeholders and the development team. 
If you also have a portfolio of professional design projects that includes work with web, mobile applications, we’d like to meet you.
JOB RESPONSIBILITIES:

You’ll partner with Engineering, Product Owner and request from Business Stakeholders to find sophisticated but practical solutions to design challenges. 
Clearly outline specifications for the design team and stakeholders.
Make sure our UI/UX delivers the best user experience, which makes your role extremely important for our success and ensuring customer satisfaction and loyalty.
Break down vaguely defined problems into solvable pieces using flowcharts and diagrams.
Be autonomous. You’ll take full ownership of your work, and you take responsibility for every last detail, every step of the way.
Other tasks to support fellow designers to ideate and execute design solutions
skill_experience:
Bachelor of Fine Arts in Graphic Design, Digital Arts & Design or any related field
3 years of demonstrated ability in UX/UI Design.
Ability to work with a team in a fast paced environment.
A portfolio demonstrating experience launching web, mobile app, or other products
Proven track record to build wireframes, mockups, prototypes, and specs to describe the user experience and interface
Have a phenomenal eye for visual design and be detail-oriented to execute high-quality design directions
Be able to communicate directly with fellow designers, product managers, stakeholders, and developers to translate their visions and constraints into beautiful, functional products.
Experience working with developers throughout the development lifecycle
Proficient in crafting and prototyping design using Figma, Adobe XD
Experience in an Agile software environment and a deep understanding of UX/UI trends across multiple platforms, Mobile Apps and Web Apps. (TV apps is an advantage) 
Experience in Entertainment apps, B2B and D2C platforms is an advantage

FPT Software is part of FPT Corporation (FPT – HoSE) – the global leading technology and IT services group headquartered in Vietnam with nearly US$2 billion in revenue and 32,000 employees. Manage multiple projects at once and drive project execution at all levels of the agile development lifecycle utilizing Scrum methodologies

Leading project teams and customers with problem analysis, estimating, software design, development, and testing of our projects.

Leading estimation process around use case sizing and align sprint/release planning to team capacity; ensure adherence to industry standard of two to four weeks for Sprint Project.
Ongoing management and development of team members including mentoring on advances and new practices in software development process, software engineering, and related technologies.
Recommend process improvements to achieve higher levels of software quality and to meet overall business objectives.

Good English written and verbal communication skills with the ability to work up, down and across organizational levels.
Strong business acumen, operations and problem-solving skills, along with the ability to assess current practices, identify opportunities for improvement, build consensus and drive the implementation of related changes.
A flexible nature, good sense of humor, the ability establishes strong working relationships, and enjoy being part of team of like-minded individuals.
Detail-orientation, with strong organizational skills, able to work under deadlines in a changing environment, and ability to manage and prioritize multiple projects simultaneously.
Strong communication skills and work ethic

Experience in Insurance domain is also a plus

location_detail: 364 Cong Hoa street, ward 13, Tan Binh, Ho Chi Minh
reason_job:

16++ days of paid leave per year
job_description:
Overall:
• Facilitate effective process / tools implementation.
• Ensure delivered quality.
• Detail activities are per RBVH/QMS role based and CC ProLib definition.

Project focus:
• Engineering Product Quality for the SW projects in Automotive Domain (SW development, V&V Testing,…).
• Perform Process Compliance Check, Work product audits, Quality Gates and internal audits,... as schedule.
• Evaluate the tailoring, CARs and 8D.

Department focus:
• Ensure process implementation in projects through training, audits and monitoring.
• Manage QA activities in the projects / department with stakeholders.
• Suggest process improvements for weak process areas and projects.
• Analyze defects at project and department level, facilitate Department level defect prevention plan or quality improvement plan.
• Proposal yearly KPIs, analyze and baseline metrics at department level.
• Ensure Implementation of counter measures in the projects from the 8D reports.
• Collect, share, publish department level LL/BP and contribute to organization’s repository.
• Communicate with representative or stakeholder at customer site.
• Take responsible for Customer Satisfaction Index metrics when required.

Organization focus:
• Assist Quality Manager for organization operation excellence activities.
• Conduct trainings on QMS training courses
• Support QMM department in process harmonization with customers (where applicable)
• Identify & collect good sample artefacts for submission to Organization Process Database Library
skill_experience:
Mandatory Skills required:

Problem analysis and problem solving, 7 QC tools, ISO 9001:2015
Good English communication skills.
Able to work independence, deal with different stakeholders.
Experienced at using QMS (quality management system)
Other Requirements:
• Background in IT Computer science/ Mechatronics preferred.
• At least 5 years of QA experience in SW project.
• Experience in quality as process engineering profile, software process audit
• Proficiency in ISO 9001:2015, CMMI Lev 3, Automotive SPICE, ISO 26262.
• MS Office experience (Excel, Word, PPT, VBA)
• Statistical Process Control
• Quality Auditor, etc

job_description:
We are looking for an experienced Product Manager/Product Owner who is passionate about building products that customers love. You will join a dynamic and fast-paced environment and work with cross-functional teams to design, build and roll-out products that deliver the company’s vision and strategy.

To succeed in this role, you should be a perceptive and creative leader and a reliable problem-solver. If you’re also confident and have a knack for knowing what ideas will and won’t work, we’d like to meet you.

Main tasks

Work with CTO (VP of Technology) to create product plans and roadmaps based on input internal stakeholders, functional teams and customers
Work closely with Development/Engineering and other teams to deliver with quick time-to-market, optimal resources and are delivered to a consistently high-quality standard.
Produce and review product requirements documents (PRD)
Track releases 
Participate in daily scrum meetings, planning, reviews and retrospectives

Organized and able to work to deadlines and roadmaps
A very strong and clear communicator, with a variety of stakeholders at different levels of seniority and knowledge

title: [HCM] Junior/Middle Tester
location_detail: 7 Floor, No. 1196 , 3/2 treet , Ward 8, District 11, Ho Chi Minh
reason_job:

Thưởng cố định tháng lương 13

job_description:
Xây dựng các bài kiểm thử (test cases), thực hiện các bài kiểm thử(thủ công và tự dộng) để đánh giá chất lượng của sản phẩm

– Viết các script tự động hóa các bài kiểm thử.

– Cập nhật và nắm vững các tính năng của sản phẩm

– Ghi nhận lỗi, tái tạo (re-produce) các lỗi giúp bộ phận phát triển xử lý.

– Đánh giá mức độ nghiêm trọng(severity) của các lỗi và xác định độ ưu tiên sửa chữa(priority)

– Đánh giá và góp ý về chức năng và trải nghiệm (UI/UX)

– Tham gia triển khai, đào tạo, hỗ trợ sử dụng phần mềm
skill_experience:
Tốt nghiệp đại học/cao đẳng các ngành liên quan đến kỹ thuật

– Ưu tiên có kinh nghiệm kiểm thử tự động; các công cụ Selenium, Katalon, QTP/UFT, Apache Jmeter, TestComplete.

– Có kiến thức về các kỹ thuật kiểm thử như Phân tích giá trị biên (Boundary Value Analysis), Phân vùng tương đương (Equivalence Class Partitioning), Bảng quyết định (Decision Table based testing), Chuyển đổi trạng thái (State Transition), Đoán lỗi (Error Guessing)…

– Có kiến thức về các phướng pháp kiểm thử (smoke, sanity, regression…), các loại kiểm thử (chức năng, hiệu suất, bảo mật…)

– Ham học hỏi, có trách nhiệm với công việc

love_working:
We hope VNG is a place where you build your career. Whether you want to pursue to be a manager or focus on professional development, we acknowledge and appreciate your talents. Therefore, we open up to you more promotion opportunities in VNG, and designed program to help you succeed in every single career path. 

NO SUIT, NO TIE: At VNG, we do not have many rules because we respect you and want to make comfortable atmosphere to help employees perform their jobs well.

Company “pay” for you: Lunch, parking, swimming, learning English or gym for free and you know you are really in care.

NO BARRIERS: Office of VNG is an open space because we always try to remove all barriers to help members easily shares with each other.

Being a big family: Like a gift for family day. A party for the kids. We know how much your family matters.

NO RANK At VNG, members are encouraged to contribute ideas and debate with the others.

Be explored: Ph.D., un-academic guy, bookish girl, fashion designers ... VNGers are different and this diversity makes life more colorful.

NO "OFFICE": Office is like your home. You can hang paintings, plant trees, even feed aquarium on the desk.

Be showed your best: VNGers like to "mortification" with the group games such as: Fansipan climbing, waterfall rafting, go over heat mats; there activities not only are tightening friendship, but also practice their bravery.

GAMING: Even if you do not make the game, stealing beans in the boss’s garden or versusing with your colleagues in a sword competition play online is also an interesting way to relax.

Changing the world: Creating an entertainment channel, building a social network and developing a game. On the Internet world, every single thing you did can change the lives of many people.

love_working:
How We're Different

When you join us, your work matters. Everything you work on directly impacts millions of people worldwide. Your voice matters. Everything you contribute shapes the future and direction of the company.

You have room to grow. If you are willing to learn, we are willing to support you. We are committed to investing in our people — the benefits we offer to every member of INKR Global reflect our philosophy.

What we can offer as you join us

Competitive starting salary plus salary reviewed every 6 months as you grow.
Attractive performance bonus aside from 13th month salary.
Company-provided Apple computers, and other stunning devices.
We'll surely hook you up with our INKR Premium subscription :)
Beautiful modern office by Crescent Lake, equipped with high-tech gadgets (VR, Xbox, drones, etc.)
Unlimited paid time off. Yes, unlimited!
We also care about your health

Full contribution of statutory insurances, and extra private insurance fully covered.
We take care of your catered lunch, snacks, drinks and an all-time stocked pantry.
Annual membership @ Platinum gym inside Crescent Plaza.
A 5-star annual company vacation for you and your +1, the one that you'd love to join.
Becoming a parent can be challenging at work, so we definitely have a plan in details for you.
At INKR we work together under one roof

Through years of trying and failing at many different ways to work, what we have learned is that the people who can stick around, contribute to the vision, live and work by our 04 values:
CARE - Courage, Attitude, Responsibility, Earnestness.

reason_job:
Competitive Compensation & Benefit package

job_description:
[WORK ANY WHERE]

JOB SUMMARY

We are looking for a Front-End Web Developer who is motivated to combine the art of design with the art of programming. Responsibilities will include translation of the UI/UX design wireframes and detailed requirements to actual code, that will produce high-quality working functions for our clients with stunning visual elements of the application.

You will work with the Product Owner/Business Analyst to understand not only the product requirement but also the context from our clients on how our features solve their real problems. Besides, you will also work with UI/UX designers and other developers/leaders to bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementation, taking an active role on both sides and defining how the application looks as well as how it works.

We expect you to be a tech-savvy professional, who is curious about new digital technologies and aspires to combine usability with visual design.

RESPONSIBILITIES

Work with other team members to understand the requirements, technical solutions and deliver high-quality, well-tested code.
Work with the team to continuously improve our products’ UI and UX to bring the best experiences to users.
Programming with modern frameworks/libraries such as Angular/React.
Not only implementing new features, but also building reusable code/components for future use.
Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability.
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs.
Assure that all user input is validated before submitting to back-end.
Collaborate with other team members (backend, product, marketing, design) to deliver features that solve users' problems.
skill_experience:
REQUIREMENTS

At least 3 years experience in web development.
Extensive knowledge and understanding of JavaScript.
Top-notch coding skills with Angular (preferred), ReactJS or VueJS.
Have good knowledge and hands-on expertise with Reactive programming, RxJS, and Typescript.
Proficient in using CSS preprocessor scripting languages, such as SASS and LESS.
Strong computer science foundation.
Fast learning and passionate about picking up new technologies.
Good English communication skills.
Excellent interpersonal and independent working skills.
Strong critical thinking and problem-solving skills.
Experience with Agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban).
PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS

Experience with Angular.
love_working:
OUR PRODUCTS

Inspectorio is a cloud-based SaaS solution focused on creating a dynamic and risk-assessment based Quality and Compliance program with the goal of generating more sustainable and transparent supply chains. Our network is a one-stop-shop platform where all key stakeholders in the production process can connect to execute, monitor, and report on Quality and Compliance activities.

Our products provide digitization, automation, transparency, and traceability, with a strong focus on Advanced analytics, Artificial Intelligence (AI) & Machine Learning. This enables us to leverage customer data for predictive insights and dynamic risk-based interventions.

OUR CUSTOMERS

Today, we work with many of the world’s leading brands and retailers, and thousands of vendors and factory organizations across the globe to bring unparalleled levels of visibility, transparency, and accuracy to their quality, sustainability, and compliance initiatives! 

Our customers include Target, Kohl's, Mango, Crocs, Carter…and many more. Further details about our customers can be found on our website:

OUR PEOPLE & CULTURE

Highly diversed, global team made up of engineers, data sciences, entrepreneurs, artists and others with multidisciplinary backgrounds. 
International environment with open, supportive and dynamic culture where all your voices are heard and you are safe to fail. 
Inspiring and thoughtful leadership team
OUR PERKS & BENEFITS

 Flexible Working Mode
Our Work From Anywhere  and Unlimited PAID Annual Leave policy will let you choose your working locations and decide how long you can take your annual leave, in order to achieve your Work-life balance the way you want it! 

Competitive Salary
At Inspectorio, we only work with the best of the best. That’s why, if we invite you to join us, it’s because we recognize your amazing skills, value, and potential. It probably wasn’t easy for you to become this awesome, so we make sure to reward you for it.

International Work Experience
We are going to take over the world.... Perhaps not quite, but we are a global company that thrives from the interactions between our different offices. Join us to work alongside Belarusians in Vietnam, Mexicans in Minsk, Filipinos in China and more.

Personal and Professional Growth
Inspectorians are our most valuable resource, so we make sure to invest heavily in them. All Inspectorians are eligible for funding to attend conferences, take courses, present their research, and more. This on top of the continuous mentoring and guidance you’ll receive guarantees you’ll grow as a professional and as a human while at Inspectorio.

Full Project Ownership
Are you an inventor? Want to start a new internship program? How about a soccer tournament? Or a whole new department within the company? Whatever it is that you want to do, we’re here to listen, and if your idea is good, we’ll give you all the resources you need to make it happen. When any Inspectorian wins, we all win.

Fun, Fun, Fun
We put our money where your smiles are. Company-sponsored trips, weekly parties, sporting events, and more. We make sure that Inspectorians enjoy coming to work by promoting as much fun as we can.

OUR VALUES

EXCELLENCE
We pursue mastery and craftmanship. “Good enough” is our enemy.

We have a thirst and desire for knowledge and continuous improvement because there’s always an opportunity to be better.

We always find time to help and learn from others.

AUTONOMY
We act independently when we recognize an opportunity for improvement.

We seek guidance, alignment, and clear goals instead of orders or hand-holding.

We self-assess the quality and impact of our work, identify opportunities to improve and make changes proactively.

COURAGE
We share our opinion and insights, even if it’s uncomfortable.

We are candid and direct with everyone we work with.

We are willing to experiment and try something new, even if we’re not sure it will succeed.

HUMBLENESS
We crave opportunities to learn from the people around us.

We focus on listening to other perspectives because we know we don’t have all the answers or best solutions.
slogan: The leading platform for quality control and compliance monitoring

title: Angular/ReactJS [$1k4-$2k4] +1mo bonus
location_detail: 131 Xo Viet Nghe Tinh, Binh Thanh, Ho Chi Minh
reason_job:
Global product & excellent team
Focus on quality & personal growth
Remote interview & remote work during covid
job_description:
We are looking for an Angular / ReactJS Developer who has solid experience with Angular / ReactJS and JavaScript (TypeScript)

What you'll be doing

Working on Web applications for a diverse range of clients and industries.
Working and pair programming with other developers to build applications with either Angular or ReactJS
Working with Product Owner to convert business requirements into technical designs.
Cooperating with UI Designer to implement modern minimalist designs into production.
Applying proven technologies and best practices to level up your technical skills: Redux, Observables, TypeScript, GraphQL
Learning new languages and frameworks to improve yourself and stay current in an ever-changing environment.
skill_experience:
Must have

Require a minimum of 2 years of experience with Angular / ReactJS.
Require solid Front-End knowledge: Javascript and HTML/CSS.
Require prior experience with REST or GraphQL.
Experience with Extreme Programming methodologies such as Test-Driven Development, Refactoring, and Continuous Integration.
Experience with Agile Process and Scrum Methodologies.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English.
Good to have

Experience with relational database systems such as MySQL and PostgreSQL.
Experience with deployment, scaling, monitoring, and performance tuning.
Experience with serverless architecture, eg AWS Lambda, GCP Cloud Function, etc.
Experience with security, performance, scalability.
love_working:
Who We Are

CodeLink is an innovative and design-focused development agency. We focus on user-centric design and agile development to bring the product vision of our clients to life. We handle the end-to-end development of products, developing the product vision through product understanding, designing experiences through UX design, refining these flows with modern UI design, and developing products through iterative agile development.

We work with both early-stage product teams and teams with existing products from a wide range of countries and industries. We focus on modern technologies and work directly with our clients. We design using design-thinking principles on tools such as Sketch, Figma, Zeplin, and more, and develop products leveraging our tech stack of React, React Native, Rails, Python, and Node.JS.

Our Core Values

1. Take full ownership of delivery
We take ownership of our client projects and ensure that we deliver what we are in charge of to the best possible outcome.

2. Deliver our highest level of quality
We take pride in the high quality that we deliver and work at a sustainable pace to ensure we can always deliver on that quality.

3. Stay consistent in plans and processes
We keep open and transparent communication with our teammates and our client whilst following agile development practices.

4. Have empathy for all those we work with
We show empathy and respect to all those we work with to gain a deeper understanding without any judgment or assumption.

5. Continuously improve and grow
We aim high with a growth mindset and see every day as an opportunity to develop ourselves, our processes, and our products.

Top 3 Reasons To Join Us

Use cutting-edge & proven technologies
Work directly with international clients
Open environment with a focus on learning
Why You’ll Love Working With Us

We work hand-in-hand with our clients to fully invest in their product development and build solutions together for their target market.

We fully invest in our team, we will help you build yourself up in any area you feel you need development, be it in English, learning a new design tool, developing your design thinking, and more. We want to make sure that you’re always learning and developing yourself whilst a part of our team.
We respect both Product and Technology equally, ensuring all of the Products we work on have features with true market potential and ensuring all of the team contribute to, understand, and believe in what they are developing.
We are very selective with our clients, we only work on awesome products we believe in and that show strong market potential.
We respect you and your personal hours, we keep a sustainable pace by working standard 8 hour days from Monday to Friday, ensuring we only plan for what we can achieve.
We are fully agile and only work with Clients who work the same, working with set sprint goals and working at our rate of velocity.
You will have ownership over your role, giving you the opportunity to experiment and try new processes to better improve your day-to-day responsibilities. We are always open to improving our processes.
Company Benefits

An open and dynamic working environment with no dress code and the freedom to be yourself.
Modern open-space office with comfortable workspace, a PS4 games room, and chill-out areas.
Salary review twice a year with opportunities for promotions and spot awards.
Culture of recognition with monthly rewards for those with the most kudos.
All office benefits and full salary during probation.
Flexible starting time up to 10 AM working Monday - Friday with no overtime and a long lunch break.
1 day remote every week taken on any days you choose so you can work from wherever you like.
Full Vietnamese holidays off with 12 annual leave days per year with all days not taken paid out in cash.
Yearly company trip, monthly team all-hands activities, welcome lunches for new members, the monthly budget for team celebrations.
Celebrations for special days in the year, such as Women’s Day, YEP, Christmas.
Gold level Health Insurance coverage from Bao Viet Insurance and a yearly complete Health Check.
Employee-led clubs within the company; games teams, sports teams, etc.
Buddy system, tech, and product talks, mentoring, and paid-for training for any skills you’d like to develop.
Weekly agile sessions and professional coaching.
Meal allowance, parking allowance, petrol allowance, and unlimited snacks and coffee every day.
Options for a full MAC or PC set-up are completely provided.
Where We Work

HCMC Head Office: We are conveniently located beside the Zoo on Xo Viet Nghe Tinh, at the border of District 1 and District Binh Thanh, with easy access for all districts and a plentiful amount of awesome food and great coffee shops around the office.
slogan: At Codelink we use React, Node.JS and Ruby with user-centric UX-UI design to create awesome products

Global Fashion Group (GFG) là điểm đến bán lẻ thời trang hàng đầu ở khu vực Châu Á Thái Bình Dương, Châu Mỹ và CIS. Chúng tôi kết nối hơn 10.000 thương hiệu toàn cầu với hơn một tỷ người dùng thông qua bốn nền tảng thương mại điện tử: THE ICONIC, ZALORA, Dafiti và Lamoda. Với 17 văn phòng trên khắp bốn châu lục, GFG tự hào sở hữu một đội ngũ năng động với kiến ​​thức chuyên môn dày dặn.

Chúng tôi đang tìm kiếm các kỹ sư phần mềm để tham gia nhóm phát triển tại GFG Việt Nam. Mục đích của nhóm là tạo ra một tiêu chuẩn mới về trải nghiệm của người dùng trên tất cả các sản phẩm của chúng tôi. Là một kỹ sư phần mềm, bạn sẽ góp phần xây dựng một nền tảng thương mại điện tử nhanh và ổn định với lưu lượng người dùng lớn dựa trên PHP, MySQL và các công nghệ khác. Chúng tôi thường xuyên tổ chức các hội thảo mini để cải thiện kỹ năng của từng cá nhân đồng thời nâng cao quy trình công việc trong nhóm.

job_description:
We are a startup with BIG dreams - revolutionize the way businesses collaborate to build next-generation customer engagement platforms, creating exceptional values for users and businesses together.

Our coalition loyalty platform enables consumers to earn rewards conveniently and joyfully by interacting with the brands of their choices across a nationwide merchant network that today reaches 30% of the Vietnamese consumers. We aim to redefine the omnichannel shopping experience and set the standards on how brands should engage their customers by leveraging data to drive consumer insights, marketing efficiency, and product personalization.

TAPTAP is a trademark of VUI Vietnam, which is a Joint Venture company that is owned by Vietnam Investments Group (VIG) and United Overseas Bank Limited (UOB).  VIG is a leading private equity firm in Vietnam with total funds under management of over USD 500 million and with stakes in over 35 brands in the market.  UOB is a leading bank in Asia, headquartered in Singapore, with a global network of over 500 offices including Vietnam.

Get to know more about us on:

Our website:
Our ://www.
What you will be responsible for:

Define and align the product roadmap with cross-functional teams that maps to the corporate’s strategy.
Engage with merchants to develop an in-depth understanding of their needs, problems, and usage scenarios.
Work with development, testing, and customer experience teams to design and deliver features in line with the product roadmap.
Work with marketing and business development team to ensure a successful launch of new products or new releases of existing solutions.
Utilize data insights, market and customer research to continually improve products.

Have a good understanding of merchants’ business and the ability to advise them on integration solutions to meet both sides’ business requests.
Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills both in English and Vietnamese.
The position is based in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam with a requirement for occasional travel.

Silentium is a software product consulting company focusing on building products for our partners, mainly in Europe. To fuel the growth, we are looking for an energetic frontend lead to share the journey of learning and growing.

RESPONSIBILITIES

Be in charge of setting up, following up, and making sure Frontend best practices for product

skill_experience:
Solid Javascript and Typescript experience and understanding, familiar with these languages best practices, and those pros and cons
Strong CSS and modern CSS styling experience, PostCSS, CSS-in-JS, familiar with styling in ReactJS
Solid ReactJS experience, proven by building and scaling a big Single Page Application. Very familiar with ReactJS performance issues, best practices, pros and cons of state management approaches
Familiar with Test libraries like the testing library, proven experience of managing and organizing Frontend test practices
Familiar with browser differences, browser common concepts, and security concepts

A plus if you have given talked to conference (please give us reference link if applicable)
OUR TECHNICAL STACK

We use Next.js for the front end. On the backend, we are on the move of incorporating Prisma to enable Next.js even further. A big part of the backend is written in Golang at the moment.

The application is split into multiple microservices, deploy onto a Docker Swarm infrastructure, and use MongoDB.

We plan to move our Database toward PostgreSQL with Prisma to speed up development even further. As such, you'll see a lot of moving pieces, but that's gonna be a chance to learn and grow as an engineer.

Face to face interview with the tech team

Peer interview with Product Manager, Product Designer, and QA

We own and operate Southeast Asia's leading logistics marketplace for the ground transportation of goods. Powered by a smart platform with enterprise mobile and web apps, our marketplace currently operates in Indonesia, Philippines and Thailand. Vietnam is our technology hub!

Our mission is to be the smartest, fastest and most economic ground transportation choice for businesses in Southeast Asia. We are amongst the leading innovators and disruptors who are applying a sophisticated technology marketplace solution to an industry that is over 100 years old. 

Our Focus

Logistics, Marketplace, Mobile App, Disruptive Technologies.

Address

431 Hoang Van Thu Street, Ward 4, Tan Binh District, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam

Role Description

Are you looking to be more than just an ordinary Big Data Engineer? Do you have what it takes to see where you can improve the lives of others through making a great and intelligent system to solve issues and improve life? Do you want your products to be used by millions of users in the world and know immediately how much they love your work?

At Deliveree, we rely on powerfully insightful data to power our systems and solutions. We are looking to hire a talented Big Data Engineer to develop and manage our company’s Big Data solutions, to find strategic solutions to tough problems.

As the Big Data Engineer, you will build useful and disruptive products, design and develop company applications, and coordinate a Data development team to deliver quality software technologies and systems. You will provide technical input to product teams and stakeholders to help make business and product decisions and be part of creating great technology products. This is a challenging but rewarding opportunity that will increase your experience in a fast moving product startup company. Join us to disrupt the logistic industry with your skills, abilities and passion for technologies.

Collecting and processing raw data at scale for a variety of projects and initiatives

Designing solutions and directly developing modules, libraries with foundational nature, high reusability, wide impact

Supporting business decisions with ad hoc analysis as needed
Monitoring data performance and modifying infrastructure as needed.

GAMING: Even if you do not make the game, stealing beans in the boss’s garden or versusing with your colleagues in a sword competition play online is also an interesting way to relax.

title: Fullstack Engineer (Ruby, NodeJS, Java)
location_detail: 181 Cao Thang Street (Charmington La Pointe Tower), District 10, Ho Chi Minh
reason_job:
People-first
Teamwork over one's work
Problem Solving Centric
job_description:
Job Scope
You’ll be working on all aspects of our product and platform: from front-end visualizations, implementing scalable, data-heavy features, helping customers with their complex SQL, to managing our servers that processed thousands of heavy jobs everyday.

Build complex and interactive data delivery platform using HTML5, JavaScript; build reusable front-end JS/HTML components.
Design and implement our features from both backend logic to frontend interactions
Build back-end components that deal with data movement and logic.
Some Cool Things We've Done/You Might Do:

Build an in-house background job queue system using just PostgreSQL and Ruby
Design and build a generic data connector that works with all major databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server, Redshift, BigQuery, etc)
Build an Excel-like Pivot Table interface for slicing and dicing of data
Build a cohort/retention analysis color-coding table (think Mixpanel/kissmetrics)
Build a new domain-specific language for analytics
Interesting Engineering Projects

Zero-downtime deployment for long-running background jobs
Writing a database abstraction layer to interface with different database technologies at once: PostgreSQL, MySQL, Redshift, BigQuery, Presto
Implement alert monitoring system using statistical algorithms
ETL customer’s data from MongoDB to relational DBs with minimal overhead.
Parsing SQL into an AST (abstract syntax tree) to understand semantics and suggest optimizations
Build a sandbox environment to execute arbitrary Python code that still ensures security
skill_experience:
Requirements
Strong problem solving (most important)
Experiences with Ruby on Rails/Ruby is a plus
Have at least 1 year of experiences in Software Development
Some experiences with Rails, Ruby, PostgreSQL, Redis, SQLs, Vue.js, ES6, TypeScript
Good English communication skill (reading and writing)
Both senior and junior positions are welcome
What We Look For In You

Problem Solving: You don’t just write code based on requirements, you debate the requirements with us.
Coding: You write good code, you’ve written code that handle a lot of load, and you enjoy optimizing and refactoring your code to make it faster
Culture & Mindset: You’re a team player; you understand how it’s like working for a startup – doing anything and everything needed (from writing blog posts, to help customers with their data problem)
Tech Stack: we use Ruby, PostgreSQL, Redis, Vue.js, ES6, TypeScript and a lot of SQLs. It’s great if you know these, but it’s not a big deal. We’re confident you’ll pick these up quickly on the job.
Basically you will not just implement features based on a task list. We need your original ideas, creativity and critical thinking skills to help us build a great data platform.
love_working:
Our Engineering Philosophy
Problem Solving Centric‍
We are not obsessed with any particular technology. We believe cool technologies might not get the job done, the right technologies do. We currently use Ruby, Node.js, VueJS with PostgreSQL and Redis but not afraid to try new things. We invented our own job scheduling system when we found nothing fit our needs.

‍Quality Over Quantity
We think performance and code quality should not be an afterthought. We favor code refactoring over adding new functionality. We focus on test-driven development, short-cycle deployment. We make sure our code is highly readable and modular with thorough technical documentations and proper design patterns.

Metrics-Driven Engineering
When it comes to engineering performance, we don't feel, we know. We don't just rely on intuitions, but let the numbers speak for itself. We have logging and monitoring properly set up. We know how fast (or slow) our site is, and how much improvements we've made compared to last week.

Our Engineering Culture
We don’t fancy free food or ping pong table, we focus on building an environment where our engineers can be productive and concentrate on solving good problems
Our engineers own the product from end to end. They are involved in and get to speak directly with the customers to understand how they’re using it
We don’t write bad code to rush for the deadline. We prefer spending more time refactoring the code over shipping bad code
Interview Process 
- Round 1: A short chat with HR (Short chat to introduce Holistics, our product, discuss to understand your skills and experiences)

- Round 2: Technical interview with Engineering team

- Round 3: Do take-home assignment (offline - deadline 3days, will be sent after Round 2)

Why You'll Love Working
👨🏼‍💼 Training & career developments

Weekly TED talks to expand skills and knowledge.
Yearly budget to support personal and professional growth, well-beings and interest cultivations.
🌏 Competitive salary and benefits

24/7 Healthcare Insurance, Periodic Medical Checkup.
Salary regular reviews, 13-month Bonus.
Stock Options for high-contributing individuals.
💕 Awesome company policies

A flexible work culture, Regular reviews, Remote policy.
14 Annual leaves/year, 14 Sick leaves/year, Children care leave policy.
Weekly happy hours. Company trip and company-organized events.
🏢 Workstations provided for maximum productivity

MacBook (or Laptop) Grant
Mechanical Keyboard + Razer Mouse
Big-screen monitor(s)
🌐 Working time: From Monday – Friday, from 9.00 a.m. to 6.00 p.m.

🌐 Work location: Charmington La Pointe Building, 181, Cao Thang Street, District 10, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.

title: Product Designer (support 13th salary)
location_detail: 431 Hoàng Văn Thụ, Phường 4, Tân Bình, Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam, Tan Binh, Ho Chi Minh
reason_job:
Excellent Benefit & Compensation Package 
Relax & Friendly Working Environment
Young & Innovative Startup
job_description:
About Deliveree 

We own and operate Southeast Asia's leading logistics marketplace for the ground transportation of goods. Powered by a smart platform with enterprise mobile and web apps, our marketplace currently operates in Indonesia, Philippines and Thailand. Our mission is to be the smartest, fastest and most economic ground transportation choice for businesses in Southeast Asia. We are amongst the leading innovators and disruptors who are applying a sophisticated technology marketplace solution to an industry that is over 100 years old. 

Summary of Position 

Title: Product Designer (UI - UX)
Position: Full-time
Length: Long-term
Description of Job 

Primary Role: 

You love product development and see your features and ideas being implemented and used by thousands of users everyday.
You want to design world-class products for multi-platforms from Mobile apps (iOS, Android) to Web.
You want to play a project leader role and work between company customer’s product and development teams and own the responsibilities of ensuring completion of integration projects and current products features into customer’s business flow.
Working Relationships: 

Report to the Head of Usability & Design.
Work closely with tech and regional product teams (Philippines, Indonesia, Thailand and Vietnam).
Professional Responsibility: 

Work closely with product and business teams to gather requirements to innovate and deliver superior product design. Job Title Senior UI/UX Product Designer Reports to Head of Usability & Design Locations HCM City
Create concept visual solution or framework and pitch to product and tech team from historical, design, business and competitive standpoint.
Manage their own tasks and assist in team management (JIRA) to deliver designs on time.
Follow DEV sprint framework to deliver on time for developers to start on implementation.
Follow and improve internal design process : brief, wireframe, concept, variations, deliverables.
Design UI & UX for Webapp, Mobile Apps and Marketing Websites for internal products.
Collaborate with front-end developers to create professional and UX-optimized products.
Create design artifacts of the appropriate fidelity depending on the needs. This can range from sketching, to flat mockups, to interactive HTML/CSS prototypes
Production of custom UI assets as required by the development team.
Maintain company products style guide.
Ability to successfully negotiate through a variety of requirements, from vague to well-defined, simple to complex.
Use of judgment to suggest optimal solutions to design problems that balance user needs, business constraints and technological realities.
Approach all projects with empathy and emotional design principles.
The individual should be comfortable working with senior members of the management team and engineers.
skill_experience:
2+ years of hands-on experience as an Interaction Designer/UX Designer/UI Designer/Visual Designer
Working knowledge in Sketch, Zeplin, prototyping platform of choice, Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator.
Ideally a post-graduate design degree preferred in UX or UI design or cognitive science/human factors.
Proficient in various design techniques such as sketching, prototyping, development of UI assets
Strong visual design skills from concept to pixel perfect screen mockups
Portfolio is must. Portfolio should showcase a good mix of web and mobile applications.
Excellent strategic problem-solving and decision-making skills in the field of user experience and design
Passion for elegant design and incorporating innovative technologies
Strong understanding of current trends in HTML, JS and CSS coding and practice
Drive for learning new approaches and techniques
Ability to successfully manage several projects simultaneously
Effective in communication, presentations and negotiations
Ability to coach and mentor those around you to make everyone a better designer
We work hard but it shouldn’t feel that way.
love_working:
REGIONAL COMPANY

An exciting opportunity to work with the fastest growing international logistics player.
International environment where you can work and learn with coworkers from different southeast asian markets.
Opportunities for onsite trip in our operating markets.
Relocation Package to HCMC if from far city or country.

title: Senior Python Developer
location_detail: 16 Tam Dao, District 10, Ho Chi Minh
reason_job:
Best agile environment
Talented developers
High salary with HR review every 6 months
job_description:
Receive a full 13th month Tet bonus as long as your first full day of work with East Agile is on or before January 11, 2022. There is no reason to wait before joining our team.

Description:

You will work in our Ho Chi Minh, Ha Noi or Da Nang office as a Senior Python developer at East Agile. 
You will work directly, in English, with the founders of new and rapidly growing Internet ventures to understand their vision and implement it on the web and on iPhone and Android smartphone platforms. 
You will use Extreme Programming and SCRUM agile development methods which include paired programming, Behavior Driven Development (BDD), Test Driven Development (TDD), and emergent business-value prioritized development. 
You will work in small teams of two to seven. 
You will enhance your skills in advanced Javascript and Python/Django working with leading American companies. You will develop applications on Cloud platforms that can grow to support millions of users. 
You will stay on the cutting edge of Internet application development.
Become a full stack developer through cross training with colleagues.
skill_experience:
Excellent logic skills.

- Excellent object oriented programming skills.

- Expertise in Python, with at least 1-year experience.

- Strong Javascript, HTML/CSS, and SQL.

- Having experience in Docker and Kubernetes is an advantage.

- Good verbal English communications skills.

- Familiar with Unix (Mac OSX, Solaris, or Linux command line).

- Familiar with test driven development (TDD, BDD), refactoring, and programming in an IDE.

- Prefer experience developing applications on the Cloud, such as EC2, Heroku, Engine Yard using relevant tools.

- Prefer ability to create well-designed user interfaces using tools such as Balsamiq and create web-optimized graphics using Photoshop or Gimp.

- Prefer experience working in an agile development environment using eXtreme Programming and/or SCRUM.

- Prefer a degree in computer science, mathematics or statistics from a top Vietnamese or foreign university.

- Willing to work closely and continuously with other programmers, almost never programming alone. Collaborate continuously with colleagues even while working remotely.
love_working:
The East Agile Experience includes:

(1) ability to transfer between our offices in Ha Noi, Ho Chi Minh City, and Da Nang,
(2) 15 days annual leave,
(3) excellent health insurance,
(4) a 40-hour regular work week with little or no after-hours work requirements,
(5) end-of-year Tet bonus,
(6) a fun and flexible working environment in a modern office,
(7) free office lunch,
(8) salary reviews every 6 months,
(9) business trips for meetings with clients in North America.
(10) Receive a full 13th month Tet bonus as long as your first full day of work with East Agile is on or before January 11, 2022.
