title: DevOps Engineer (Linux, System Engineer)
location_detail: 96 Nguyễn Thị Minh Khai, Phường 6, District 3, Ho Chi Minh
reason_job:
We have a great product!
You'll grow very quickly as a developer/researcher
Great benefits as part of the foundation team
job_description:
Founded in Ho Chi Minh City, Viet Nam, OLLI ( is a Hardware + AI startup committed to serving the Vietnamese community with high-tech products, aimed to transform the way we interact with the environment and other people around us. Our products are crafted to the highest standards and powered by the latest breakthroughs in the field of artificial intelligence.

Job Description:

We are looking for a DevOps Engineer

Works with application developers to automate and accelerate the testing, release, and deployment of applications into a runtime environment quickly and reliably.
Build and maintain data flows, pipelines and assets using integration tools.
Establish and employ Continuous Integration practices and tools such as Jenkins or other CI tools.
Communicate effectively – must be able to discuss and clearly communicate technical issues
Must be at ease working in an agile environment with little supervision.
skill_experience:
Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science/Information Systems/Software Engineering, or comparable experience
2+ years experience in Backend and/or DevOps.
Experience with Docker and / or Kubernetes container orchestration tools
Experience with DevOps tools such as Jenkins is a plus
Scripting (shell, python) skills for monitoring and automation
Experience in cloud-based deployment (GCE, AWS).
We are constantly evolving our toolset looking for best in breed solutions, but here are some of the technologies we are currently:

Linux
Jenkins
Docker
Kubernetes
Kafka
ElasticSearch
Ansible / Chef (optional)
love_working:
3F forever: you are guaranteed to experience our 3F office motto “FOOD, FRIENDS AND … FUN”.
You'll learn a lot: we don't do outsourcing so you won't have to deal with the frequent technology switch that comes with a new outsourcing project (and therefore not having enough time to really master any of them). Here you are the owner of your slice of the product. You'll have the opportunity to dig deep into whatever technology you're working with and become really good at it. There are milestones to follow, but in general you'll manage your own tasks and set your own pace.
Young and dynamic working environment: we try to maintain an easygoing working environment where there is no rigid structure, everyone's feedback is valued and you're free to chime in any topic you like. We need the different perspectives.
Work hard, play hard: we like you to play as hard as you work, too. We've got darts, hoop, guitar in the office with more coming soon.
Annual off-site trip: our first trip was to Shanghai.
Unlimited food, drinks and snacks: from “mì gói” to sausage to Red Bull, you name it, you have it. Plus, you can always eat while you work, no need to wait for the common break.
Flexible salary reviews: you perform well, you get a raise. At any time of the year. No need to wait for an annual salary review.

Other benefits:
13th month salary.
Standard 40-hour work week, from Monday to Friday.
12 days of annual leave.
Social, medical and unemployment insurance plus other benefits in accordance with regulations.
slogan: Công Ty Cổ Phần Công nghệ OLLI

job_description:
At Deliveree, we disrupt the logistics industry with technology.

Company Description

We own and operate Southeast Asia's leading logistics marketplace for the ground transportation of goods. Powered by a smart platform with enterprise mobile and web apps, our marketplace currently operates in Indonesia, Philippines and Thailand. 

Our mission is to be the smartest, fastest and most economic ground transportation choice for businesses in Southeast Asia. We are amongst the leading innovators and disruptors who are applying a sophisticated technology marketplace solution to an industry that is over 100 years old. 

Our Focus

Logistics, Marketplace, Mobile App, Disruptive Technologies.

Who Are We Looking For?

Product innovation and technology minded people who want to bring their ideas to life and make users lives easier and businesses more successful. 

Address

431A Hoàng Văn Thụ, Phường 4, Tân Bình, Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam

Summary of Opportunity

Deliveree is a fast moving, rapidly growing and very successful logistics technology company that is changing the cargo and trucking industry in Indonesia, Thailand and Philippines to reduce waste, grow the economy, create jobs, and make the logistics industry more competitive.

For our Business Analyst position,  we are seeking talented, ambitious, hard working, and career-minded candidates with a degree in computer science, Information communication technology or information systems from a recognized university and strong English skills.

You should have a keen interest in business, especially early-stage startup business, and be willing to prioritize an accelerated career as your highest priority. We believe that anything is possible if you want it badly enough and we're looking for others who believe the same thing. 

When you interview with us, you will be considered for assignment to the Vietnam product team who closely work with the country directors, group executives and all of the three markets operations teams. Your home base will be at our Product Development Center (PDC) in Ho Chi Minh City. 

If this description excites you, please read our qualification requirements below.

Description of Job

Understand business processes to translate business needs and requirements into documents, process diagrams and wireframes to support product development
Work with stakeholders to identify opportunities and process improvements by leveraging organization data to drive business solutions
Work with engineers to design and implement architecturally sound solutions
Gather market trends and internal data to conduct business analysis and provide recommendations and enhancements to the business
Analyze and document business requirements in details by using UML Diagrams, Use Cases, Functional Specifications and communicate them clearly to Stakeholders and Software Development Team
Participate in user testing and create documentation and user manuals for business
Any other tasks assigned by the company from time to time.

Excellent verbal and written english communication skills with excellent presentation skills
Good skills in problem solving, analyzing data, requirement gathering and documentation with attention to detail

Excellent skills in critical thinking, stakeholder management and communication skills.

As a member of Operation Product team, you will work on various solutions that manage our entire fleet of warehouses (inventory management, order fulfillment) and logistics network (including our own Tiki Delivery team – key enabler for initiative such as TikiNow). title: Data Engineer
location_detail: 27 Nguyễn Đình Chiểu, Đa Kao, District 1, Ho Chi Minh
reason_job:
A leading digital health company in Asia
9 markets and 14 different languages
Super fun and Challenging
job_description:
The Purpose of Your Role

As the Data Engineer, you are responsible for building and maintaining an organization’s entire data ecosystem, which includes everything from data sources and databases to data storage solutions. This also includes building data pipelines that are used to transport data from a data source to a data warehouse. These pipelines are crucial: they are what enable an organization to access and analyze its data, and use the insights to make business decisions. Data pipeline transport and transform data according to established business rules or a line of exploratory analysis the business wants to undertake.

Your Key Responsibilities

Deliver Advanced Analytical Services

● Planning / Prioritization:

Based on decisions following the business process, the product development team together with CTO will work to allocate time and resources to the decided work slate.
You’ll work closely with senior stakeholders to ensure all aspects of the data business are considered in these advances. Feedback will be collected directly and indirectly through sales and define development projects and schedules together with the CTO.
● Quality Management/Testing:

You’ll ensure a high-quality level in case of new releases, APIs, and functionalities, as well as in the standard of reporting provided to Clients. The high quality is based on adequate and extensive testing.
● Explore Data Warehousing:

You’ll build the data warehouse strategy that should provide consistent, clean, and integrated data.
● Your KPI Include:

100% Delivery of the Data Engineering Roadmap
Minimum 2 Application delivery per month
Data Governance

Data governance will be a very important part of your role as a Data Engineer. Primarily, you will be responsible for protecting your organization’s data from interference, theft, corruption, and loss. Governing data includes creating strategic data access policies, both internally and externally.

● Keep up with ever-changing data protection regulations.

● Avoid data breaches by ensuring that everyone who can access information is authorized.

● Put measures to protect stored data and data that is being transmitted.

As a Data Engineer, you will be responsible for driving data security awareness across the organization by outlining and enforcing rules, rights, and accountabilities. It is helpful if a set of standards is in place in regard to naming, abbreviation, acronyms, etc. Consistency in these areas will help data to be easily cataloged and make sure that employees can find the data they are looking for without wasting time. Crucially, you will need to keep data ethics at the forefront of your operation. This includes:

● Protecting collected data from leaks.

● Being aware of the intentions of anyone who might want to purchase your data.

● Ensuring your own organization is using data ethically.

Optimizing Data Management Process & Delivering Documentation

● Establish and implement the overall strategy and transformation in collaboration with the C-level

stakeholders, other counterparts, and functional teams for the group to enable measurable results for each country.

● You’ll engage in Agile/Scrum methodologies to ensure adherence to the roadmap.

● You’ll work in a 'squad' formation, partnering with the product team to run sprints, manage the backlog, build-out capabilities, etc.

● Your KPI Include:

100% Data Products documentation for the External Stakeholders.
Improving efficiency rate.

title: IT Service Quality Management
location_detail: 702 Nguyen Van Linh, District 7, Ho Chi Minh
reason_job:
International working environment
Generous staff benefits
Opportunities for career development
job_description:
The position is responsible for monitoring ITS ticketing systems activities on ServiceNow by collecting and analysing data; updating and advising informing relevant stakeholders; identifying the root cause leading to different types of incidents and then initiating corrective actions to address the issue in compliance with SLA about Release and Change Management, Configuration and Asset Management, Problem Management, and Incident Management. Details are as below:

Improve the efficiency of ticketing systems activities on ServiceNow, including managing time window for each level of service, identifying workflow for how the ticket was handled and responsibilities of each party, escalating tickets when additional support is required.
Act as the main point of information to collect and summary data, informing stakeholders in a timely manner; identifying the root cause leading to one or more incidents and then initiating actions to rectify the issue in compliance with SLA about Release and Change Management, Configuration and Asset Management, Problem Management, and Incident Management.
Coordinate with incidents response teams to resolve major incidents and restore business services for all ITS-managed systems.
Understand, troubleshoot, and navigate through complex incidents and assign tasks to relevant stakeholders or escalate to the next level support group where needed.
Participate in the Critical Incident Response Team (CIRT) function to assist with the resolution of incidents as required.
Review records and processes of Change and Release management procedures through the relevant workflows. Participate in reviewing and implementing changes in systems/products/processes from RMIT Melbourne to RMIT Vietnam while minimizing disruptions and preventing potential problems or incidents.
Provide updates to key stakeholders regarding changes per periodically renewal process or when change request occurs.
Manage and maintain the Change Management Database updated after Changes and Releases management process to relevant stakeholders.
Ensure all data records about incidents/change requests/problems are correct and up to date.
Collect and organize information before Change Advisory Board (CAB) meeting. Review agendas and record minutes of CAB meeting in conjunction with Forward Schedule of Changes.
skill_experience:
Bachelor’s degree in information technology or relevant degree with at least 3 years of industry-related experience in a similar role.
Knowledge of the ITIL framework. ITIL certification and training experience are desirable.
Demonstrated knowledge in Release and Change Management, Configuration and Asset Management, Problem Management, and Incident Management.
Ability to convene and chair meetings with agenda, minutes, and follow-up actions.
Interpersonal skills, including negotiation, liaison, and cross-cultural communication.
Ability to identify opportunities and areas for improvements, and initiate, lead and implement change to achieve efficiency and continuous improvement.
Strong in time and workload management skills with demonstrated ability to prioritise effectively, manage multiple tasks, meet deadlines, and achieve required outcomes and effectively deliver results.
love_working: Working in a team of young, talented and skilled developers. Well-equiped working condidtion in a friendly environment. Clear career path that moving you forward. Many other opportunities designed for you only. Come and discover!
slogan: An Asian campus of Melbourne-based University RMIT

GSOFT là một công ty phần mềm hướng công nghệ, được sáng lập bởi những người có tâm huyết, có năng lực và kinh nghiệm chuyên môn cao với mong muốn hình thành và phát triển một công ty phần mềm hàng đầu tại Việt Nam và vươn tầm ra thế giới.

GSOFT cung cấp các giải pháp phần mềm quản lý cho các doanh nghiệp tập đoàn, tổng công ty, ngân hàng, trường đại học, bệnh viện, các giải pháp kết nối  cộng  đồng  trên  nền  tảng  internet, các hệ thống website và các dịch vụ liên quan đến website, các hệ thống trong lĩnh vực thương mại điện tử và chính phủ điện tử.

Phát triển, lập tài liệu và thực hiện các tiêu chuẩn đảm bảo chất lượng.
Làm việc như một thành viên cao cấp của đội phát triển phần mềm và đảm bảo rằng trước khi phần mềm được đưa ra sử dụng, nó đã có chất lượng tốt nhất có thể

Làm việc trong môi trường Agile - Scrum

Thu nhập thỏa thuận + phụ cấp + thưởng năm + thưởng khác.
Nghỉ thứ 7, chủ nhật, phép năm và các ngày lễ theo quy định
Chế độ BHXH, BHYT, BHTN, thai sản theo quy định của nhà nước

Được tham gia các hoạt động phong trào ngoại khoá, vui chơi giải trí, du lịch do công ty tổ chức.
Chính sách Sinh nhật, kết hôn, sinh con,…
Được tham gia các khóa đào tạo không giới hạn để nâng cao kỹ năng phục vụ cho công việc.

title: [Remote] Sr Automation QA QC Engineer
location_detail: Saigon Giai Phong Building, 432-438 Nguyen Thi Minh Khai, District 3, Ho Chi Minh
reason_job:
Appealing salary and benefits
13th month salary and 20 days annual leave 
Attractive career path
job_description:
EQONEX Group is a NASDAQ listed digital assets financial services company focused on fairness, governance, and innovation. The group encompasses a cryptocurrency exchange, EQONEX, as well as an over-the-counter trading platform. It also offers a front-to-back integrated trading platform, Access Trading, a securitization advisory service, EQONEX Capital, a market-leading hot and cold custodian Digivault, and asset management business Bletchley Park.

The Team

We have established a team of highly skilled developers, security and systems engineers who have helped build our institutional-grade digital assets exchange platform. We are now looking to grow our team as we look to enhance and develop our product offering further. You will be working together with a distributed team with core teams now being set up in Hong Kong, Singapore and London.
Remote opportunity for non Ho Chi Minh based candidates (travel onsite can be required for major needs and learning)
Primary Responsibilities

The role works closely with the Product Owners and development teams, and DevOps to develop and execute the quality assurance framework and code testing for our digital asset exchange. This includes designing & executing functional and security testing plans (e.g. UAT, SIT, penetration testing), determining acceptance criteria, writing automation scripts to automate these tests, monitoring & triaging issues, and driving best practices in quality assurance, and ensuring high-quality code hygiene. This individual will be expected to contribute to the continuous improvement of these processes

The role may also need to manage external vendors (e.g. penetration testing company) to execute these tests and occasionally work on-site with the external development teams to monitor and improve the team's coding quality.
skill_experience:
Requirements

4+ years in software testing/quality assurance
Experience with both manual and automated testing with a strong knowledge of current best practices and tools
Experience with building out the quality assurance processes and team from the ground up
Demonstrates an understanding of Software Testing Lifecycle (STLC)
Experience working with offshore development teams
Experienced in the testing of FIX and Rest APIs, and other high-performance low latency architectures
Ability to lead cross-functionally and solicit consensus across teams in an agile working environment
Strong interpersonal skills, approachable and collaborative attitude
Highly flexible and independent; comfortable working with minimal supervision
English reading, writing, and verbal skills
Ability to work OT when is required
Preferred

Knowledge of digital asset space and a strong desire to learn
Prior experience in traditional finance, fintech or other relevant financial services
Development experience with Java and AWS services
Experienced in TDD / continuous integration and delivery
Experience with Project Management tools such as Jira/Confluence and Aha!
love_working:
Can join after Tet!
13th month salary (includes one month Tet bonus)
20 days annual leave rising by one day upon your anniversary to 25 days max after five years services
Full social insurance & unemployment insurance according to Vietnam Labor Law
Health Insurance
Annual Health Check
Learning & Development allowance
WFH 2 days per month
Annual Performance Review
Attractive career path
Chance to collaborate and work with our Singapore, Hong Kong and Manila Offices
slogan: EQONEX the world first NASDAQ listed digital asset financial services company.

title: Power BI Dev (Data Analyst, SQL, AWS)
location_detail: Other, Thu Duc City, Ho Chi Minh
reason_job: none
job_description:
Discova is looking for a Power BI Developer/Data Modeler to join the team in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. In this business-critical role, you will be using the latest methodologies and tech in the BI space and participate in the enhancement of a global BI solution. Using Power BI you will be developing and designing Business Intelligence reporting based on data delivered through Hive tables and databases. You will be well versed in SQL, experienced in scoping/designing data marts for BI consumption preferably with Power BI shared datasets, and assisting with other ad-hoc reporting. A high level of experience in transforming business requirements into reusable tabular data models is essential for success in this role. Experience as a dedicated data modeler would be highly regarded.

Implementation of BI dashboards while ensuring the solution meets flexibility, usability, and performance requirements
Assisting with the creation and maintenance of SQL store procedures, views, and ad-hoc SQL reporting, including directly querying delta lake through HIVE and Databricks notebooks
Work cross-functionally with Technology, Operations, Products, and Finance to deliver strategic projects allowing the company to offer the best customer experience.
Data protection
Follow and take a leading role in Global BI's established policies and procedures for solution development lifecycle, including analysis, design, testing,
Tourplan system enhancements for further automation e.g. auto uploads of cash receipts and payments, auto reconciliations, fine-tuning of month-end processes.
Power BI and integration with Tourplan system and other sources of data to provide better information for leaders.
Maintain and support data analytics platforms
Integration of Tourplan system back end to other 3rd party distribution and reservation systems to ensure transactions are recorded correctly and efficiently eg. Bokun, Live, Travelbox (new Calypso).
Work closely with selling business teams to understand information requirements to ensure solutions align with business needs
Identify areas of inefficiency in the existing system/ manual processes, and help users to define business requirements that may entail process streamlining and/or automation. Assist users and provide guidance in process mapping for as-is and to-be process modeling.
Create an environment where people feel supported, connected, and empowered.
Ensure that what is meant to happen in the business does happen.
Build trust and strong working relationships with business teams to ensure that Discovers finance operations are executed in line with the prescribed SLAs.
skill_experience:
The Essentials:

1 - 2 years' Data Analysis experience or similar
Experience with PowerBI, SQL (Google BigQuery, AWS, MongoDB)
Strong Microsoft Applications capability, particularly with Excel and data manipulation
Strong attention to detail and ability to identify trends within data sets
Financial knowledge is additional.
Fluent in written and verbal in both Vietnamese language and English.
The Attributes:

Proven problem-solving skills.
Customer-centric with a commitment to high standards of service delivery.
High attention to detail & strong time/priority management skills
Effective time/priority management skills.
Strong interpersonal and presentation skills across different cultures.
A flexible rotating roster that may include late nights, weekends, and early mornings and flexible with uncertainties/changing priorities and under pressure.
Ability to travel on business when required

job_description:
We are hiring on behalf of a Singapore based AI company with subsidiaries in around Asia and the UK.

Helping to build the future of work by developing technology to interpret, extract, process and reconcile data workflows across structured, semi-structured and unstructured sources. The company's primary product offers interprets and extracts data from documents, and then matches this data between sources, without the need for templates. 

Since incorporating in 2018, Staple has been backed by Entrepreneur First (joinef.com), and 500 Startups (500.co), and has won awards and recognition from Ernst and Young, Accenture and Enterprise Singapore to name a few. Their customers represent some of the largest multinationals in Singapore, and some of the largest financial institutions worldwide. As the client base grows, they are looking to onboard more talented engineers to join their elite team. 

Description 

Staple’s Front end, in browser platform uses ReactJS, Typescript, Apollo and Materials UI components. The User interface is complex, and we are now looking for additional talented developers to join our team as we continue to add product features. 

You will join a team of other Engineers and DevOps, and are expected to grow into a senior team leadership role. 

Responsibilities 

Adding features to Staples user interface, and updating appropriate testing scripts.
Designing and suggesting new features and flows for the user interface
Updating software subject to incoming vulnerability scans to ensure we remain secure
Deploying the software to cluster using K8s
Connecting services to the backend with graphQL/apollo
Keep Staple’s platform working optimally

love_working:
Our mission is to be the embodiment of our core values that work is not just about going through the motion, but it is to effectively find innovative ways to do things better to achieve desired results while holding fast to moral principles. 

Here at Worknetics we embrace an inclusive team-based culture where employee participation at all levels are valued. We encourage communication, feedback and ideas to be exchanged in every team meeting. We believe that our organization culture is a representation of who we are to our members, clients and partners. Therefore, we believe strongly in establishing our corporate foundation in 5 main pillars.

1. People-Centric

We believe in empowering people to be the best they can be in life and in work. This is because everyone’s success is also our success.

2. Co-Create

We are all creators, our nature is to challenge the norm and to dare to venture into new frontiers without the fear of failing. Best of all, we do it together.

3. Genuine

We are genuine to our brand, our mission and our values. We strive to be better by always being honest and transparent as we can be.

4. Tenacity

We recognize that success requires a sheer amount of determination! A consistent effort to breakthrough every ceiling to reach higher than before.

5. Empathy

We are all human at the end of the day and we ought to look out for one other, be it in the workplace or out.

·       Develop and continuously improve data pipeline architecture, including data crawling with RESTful API and web scrapping, data ETL / ELT, Data Lake / Data Warehouse / Data Marts, DataOps / MLOps.

·       Perform technical review, coaching and guidance to Data Engineers who participate in various agile Squads. Provide technical expertise to enable Data Engineers to resolve blockers or impediments.

·       Ensure that the Data Engineers design and implement scalable data pipeline solution in accordance to architecture, technology standards and best practices. Data pipeline must be able scale to assemble large, complex data sets from 1st, 2nd and 3rd party data sources in real-time.

·       Setup DataOps / MLOps to accelerate the continuous integration and continuous deployment of Data Engineering and Machine Learning solutions. Collaborate with Data Engineers, Data Scientists and Data Analyts to onboard onto DataOps and MLOps.

·       Setup automated monitoring solution to continuously monitor reliability, availability and performance of Data pipelines components and processes. Able to detect incidents in real-time, so that incidents can be resolved in near real-time.

·       Ensure processes related to incident management and problem management are in place, including Service Level to ensure incidents and problems are resolved timely in accordance to Service Level.
skill_experience:
In order to succeed in the role, you should ideally have:

·       Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Systems or another quantitative field.

·       More than 6 years hands-on engineering experience, with at least 3 years in Data Engineering.

·       At least 2 years in people management experience.

·       Hands-on experience with designing and implementing data pipeline on AWS Stack, including, AWS S3, Lambda, EC2 / Fargate, EKS, Glue, RDS Aurora, Redshift, Cloudwatch.

·       Hands-on experience with 1 or more of the following tools and libraries – Airflow, Airbyte, Selenium, Python, Java, JavaScript, ELK, Apache Kafka, SQL, Apache Spark.

·       Experience working with Agile development framework.

·       Good communication skills with stakeholders, including various Technology teams, Data Analysis teams, Business teams.

·       Able to communicate fluently in Vietnamese. Fluency in English is an added advantage.

Onpoint is the largest E-commerce enabler in Vietnam, providing end-to-end services, helping brands to accelerate and become more successful online in Vietnam and SEA region. Onpoint's mission is to make E-commerce easy for brands, to create sustainable values for businesses, consumers, and partners.

It's a privilege for us to serve top tier clients. Our integrated capabilities encompass all aspects of the E-commerce value chain covering store commercial and operations, digital marketing, customer services, warehousing, and fulfillment. We help a brand execute their E-com strategies by selling their goods directly to customers online or by providing services to assist with their E-com operations. Our business ranges from the largest online shopping platforms as well as social shopping channels.

Since day one, we have dedicated ourselves to the needs of our brand partners. We work closely to ensure our direction and thought processes are tightly aligned with their needs

title: Data Automation Engineer_Database, QA QC
location_detail: Villa 18, Riverview 6, Vinhomes Golden River, 2 Nguyen Huu Canh, Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, HCMC, District 1, Ho Chi Minh
reason_job:

job_description:
Public market deals transact in milliseconds, but private market transactions can take weeks or months to close. Legal and commercial negotiation of agreements, messy communication, cumbersome closing processes, and human errors complicate the execution of private deals. 

Anduin helps investors, fund managers, lawyers & companies facilitate these processes with workflow tools to reduce the time and effort it takes to close different types of private market transactions. 

Our products: Fundsub.io - Anduinroom.io - Anduinsign.io 

As leaders and engineers at Palantir Technologies, One King's Lane, IBM, WalmartLabs and imo.im, the founding team has hands-on experience applying Silicon Valley best practices to team building and product creation. Our mission is to create a universal standard for tracking and managing transactions in financial markets. We are forming a world-class team in San Francisco and Ho Chi Minh City and are backed by top-tier industry influencers and insiders.

We are looking for Data Automation Engineers, who will work closely with both software development and legal teams to take part in various phases of the operation of our Legal Services, which is a crucial part of Anduin Fund Subscription and Fund Operation products ( This role requires a mix of different skills in software engineering, so candidates from various backgrounds are welcomed to try out if you are interested in picking up new skills while on the job.

Job Responsibilities:

Digitizing legal documents into logic-driven smart web forms
            * Work closely with the legal team and customer to design highly customized smart legal documents

            * Implement smart form UI & logics

            * Work closely with QA team to ensure high quality for smart forms

Analyzing data collected via the smart forms
            * Use data collected by smart forms to generate insights and reports

            * Write scripts to transpose data to different schemas for different data processing pipelines 

Enhancing internal tools to increase the productivity of the above work
            * Work closely with the software development team to improve Anduin proprietary technologies to increase the quality & scale of Legal Services
skill_experience:
Job Qualifications:

3+ years of working experience in software development, data engineering, or automation QA (who would like to change the line of work)
          * Experience with web development is a plus

          * Familiarity with data processing pipeline is a plus

          * Good sense of UI/UX is a plus

          * A mix of all above is not required but a BIG plus

Excellent analytical & problem-solving skills
Good at time management & detail-oriented
Good communicator, particularly in English
love_working:
Online interview
High salary
Awesome colleagues
Generous compensation
Unlimited vacation policy
Comprehensive health insurance
Nice office with lots of cool stuff to relax (games, billiards)
Working place: District 1, HCMC.
slogan: A modular and interoperable suite of tools for private market transactions

- Chính sách thu nhập được xây dựng dựa trên các tiêu chí: tương xứng với kết quả công việc, khác biệt và cạnh tranh trên thị trường, khuyến khích tăng kết quả và chất lượng công việc, công bằng và minh bạch.
- Chính sách thu nhập được công khai. Từ đầu năm, nhân viên có thể biết được kế hoạch thu nhập và tự tính được thu nhập của mình. Với một mức thu nhập mong muốn nào đó, nhân viên biết mình phải hoàn thành kết quả công việc tương xứng như thế nào và chủ động tìm kiếm công việc chứ không chờ giao việc.

- Các khoản thưởng khác theo kết quả kinh doanh và hiệu quả của dự án/công việc; thưởng các ngày lễ, tết …

Do đó, các cấp quản lý luôn nâng đỡ, có trách nhiệm giao việc rõ ràng tạo nền tảng để nhân viên thành công. Đặt niềm tin, đối xử dựa trên năng lực hành việc làm việc và kết quả một cách công bằng nhất.

GreenFeed Việt Nam luôn tìm kiếm những cá nhân độc lập và khác biệt đảm bảo các yêu cầu cơ bản: trung thực, tự tin, nhiệt huyết, thực thi, kiên quyết, cầu tiến, đồng lòng, đồng đội và can đảm. Ngoài ra, các cấp lãnh đạo và quản lý luôn tôn trọng và tạo sự tin tưởng, nâng đỡ nhân viên phát triển và thành công với tâm thế thẳng thắn, trách nhiệm và công bằng. Tạo môi trường lành mạnh, rõ ràng và minh bạch. Đây là các giá trị cốt lõi mà công ty đã và đang hướng đến.

MÔI TRƯỜNG LÀM VIỆC

Không gian làm việc GreenFeed Việt Nam là một không gian mở, thúc đẩy sự sáng tạo. Đồng thời, tất cả các thành viên đều được khuyến khích đóng góp ý kiến, chia sẻ và tranh luận một cách thẳng thắn để thắt chặt tình đồng đội và rèn luyện bản lĩnh của mỗi người.

ĐÃI NGỘ - PHÚC LỢI

Chúng tôi luôn hướng đến một chính sách đãi ngộ cạnh tranh dựa trên giá trị mà đội ngũ CB-CNV tạo ra. Chính sách này thể hiện sự tôn trọng của GreenFeed Việt Nam đối với nghề nghiệp, cuộc sống, gia đình của mỗi nhân viên, đảm bảo nhân viên có thể an tâm phát triển sự nghiệp, cống hiến cùng Công ty để tiếp tục tạo ra và chia sẻ những giá trị mới.

Ở GreenFeed Việt Nam, chúng tôi muốn là nơi nhân viên xây dựng sự nghiệp. Dù muốn theo đuổi công việc quản lý hay tập trung phát triển chuyên môn, đều được công nhận và đánh giá cao tài năng. Vì thế, chúng tôi mở ra nhiều hướng thăng tiến tại công ty, đồng thời thiết kế những chương trình giúp nhân viên phát triển sự nghiệp cho mỗi chặng đường.
slogan: Công ty Cổ phần GreenFeed Việt Nam

The Technical Services Manager (TSM) will provide high level technical management for Data Centre Services and its customers. Split between operational and technical services, providing IT management across platforms, technologies, processes and services.

Ensure optimal running of all technical operations and services for all data centre customers.

Lead technical customer discussions. Do this with the best possible outcome as your main priority.
Provide advice and guidance to the technical specialist team and act as an escalation point within the function where required. 
Track, record and actively monitor a customer technical risk log across all Customer IT solutions in order to recommend service improvements and drive forward the best solution and service for the customer. 
Oversee technical documents/ matrix management covering infrastructure/storage/network in order to lead multiple technical teams as part of any major incident. 
Design and production of documentation to a high level including technical drawing, process models, customer communications and major incident reporting. 
Lead technical and process guidance plus make recommendations across Incident, Problem and Change management within Data centre Services. 
Recommend actions and inputs plus always be looking to visualise the value add on Data Centre technical road maps and future states. 
Adhere to all company policies and processes as communicated by line management in accordance with corporate ISO accreditation levels. 
Support and where necessary be part of an Out of Hours Management escalation process.
